name: Mailgo
tagline: AI-powered cold email platform that boosts deliverability
description: Mailgo unifies AI leads finding agent, smart scheduling, and pre-warmed accounts into one intuitive platform—helping sales teams and entrepreneurs reach inboxes, scale effortlessly, and convert faster. Try it for free and share your insights!

name: Boxo
tagline: Quickly deploy AI-generated features in your mobile app
description: Boxo lets you instantly embed AI-generated screens into your mobile app—no complex integration needed. Works with any AI tools like Lovable, Bolt, v0 and Replit. Supports native features like haptics, auth, and payments. Build faster. Launch smarter.

name: Claude Research
tagline: Claude takes research to new places
description: Today we’re launching Research, alongside a new Google Workspace integration. Claude now brings together information from your work and the web.

name: Kling AI 2.0
tagline: Next-level AI video & image generation + editing
description: Kling AI 2.0 is all about empowering creators to bring meaningful stories to life — with powerful tools and greater creative freedom!

name: Sparkles
tagline: Resurface Wisdom with Widgets & Notifications
description: Sparkles helps you remember and live your deepest insights, mantras & affirmations with timely reminders, widgets, and a wisdom-sharing community. Bridging the gap between notes and daily life so your insights enrich your days and truly integrate.

name: Software Prices by Vendr
tagline: Get the price, without sitting through the sales pitch.
description: Software Prices by Vendr is a free Chrome Extension that shows you what products actually cost — right on pricing pages and review sites as you browse. Instantly see price ranges for 20,000+ products. Browse for SaaS. See real prices. Free forever.

name: Gamma 2.0
tagline: Presentations, websites, and socials created instantly
description: Gamma is your AI design partner for effortless presentations, websites, social media posts, and more—so you can focus on what you do best.

name: Why My Wife Yelling At Me
tagline: AI wife simulator: helping you survive marriage... virtually
description: Why My Wife Yelling At Me - Experience how your wife would react to your mistakes in a humorous way. Get authentic scolding from your virtual spouse.

name: Guidemaker
tagline: Free How-to Guide & SOP Creator
description: Instantly generate how-to guides and SOPS while you work using AI — all for free with no limits on usage. Guidemaker integrates with your favorite tools like Wordpress, Shopify, Webflow, Confluence, and more.

name: Acedit
tagline: Ace Interviews: AI Prep & Live Assist
description: Never freeze in interviews again! Acedit is your AI coach providing real-time answer suggestions during calls + personalized prep (Q&A, mocks) tailored to you & the job. Boost confidence & land your dream role!

name: Agent Development Kit
tagline: Build multi-agent systems with Google's open framework
description: Build powerful multi-agent systems with Agent Development Kit (ADK), It's open-source, featured flexible orchestration, rich tool/model ecosystem & built-in evaluation.

name: errsole
tagline: First open-source Node.js logger with a built-in log viewer
description: Errsole is a free open-source logger for Node.js applications. It comes with a built-in log viewer to view, filter, and search your application logs. Key Features: Minimal Setup, Advanced Logging, Built-in Log Viewer, Critical Error Notifications

name: Super Builder 2.0
tagline: A drag-and-drop website builder for Notion
description: Introducing an updated version of the popular Super Builder! A free drag-and-drop website building template for Notion. Comes with over 60 pre-built components and custom themes.

name: Star Wars Intro Creator
tagline: Create your own Star Wars opening crawl in seconds
description: Make your own Star Wars opening crawl for free in seconds. Just enter your text, play your star wars intro and share it!

name: CapWords
tagline: Learn a new language with AI-powered object recognition
description: CapWords helps you learn new languages using the world around you. Snap a photo of any object, and get instant translations, pronunciation, and examples. No flashcards—just real-life learning from familiar things.

name: Deeptrue
tagline: Video conferencing with real-time video translation
description: The world’s first video conferencing platform with real-time video translation with lip-sync. You speak in your own language — but to others, it looks and sounds like you’re speaking theirs. It’s real-time, and fully lip-synced.

name: Dropshare 6
tagline: No frills way to upload files, share a link and be done
description: Upload File, Share Link, Done. Upload screen shots, screen recordings and any files to your trusted storage provider and share them immediately with just a link.

name: Phare Status Pages
tagline: Get a sleek status pages with your own domain name
description: Monitor your website from 11 regions, collaboratively manage incidents and communicate with your users through a sleek status page, hosted on your own domain name.

name: Cerebro
tagline: Cerebro turns information into connected insights
description: Cerebro, the revolutionary knowledge management tool. Seamlessly organize, connect, and amplify your ideas like never before.

name: PrmptVault
tagline: Save your best AI prompts. Access and share them anywhere
description: I was struggling to keep my AI prompts organized and accessible so I built PrmptVault. It’s a simple, organized home for your prompts, with support for ChatGPT, Claude and more. Add parameters, share prompts, access your prompts from your apps with our API.
